title: Radish and lettuce slaw with peanut-ginger dressing

ingredients.item: ½ chinese leaf lettuce, finely shredded

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 190°C, gas mark 5. Spread the peanuts out on a baking tray and roast for 6-8 minutes, until golden and fragrant. Cool, then roughly crush or chop.

Gradually stir the soy sauce into the peanut butter, then stir in the lime zest and juice, ginger and honey to make a dressing. Toss with the radishes, chinese leaf lettuce, salad onion, carrots and coriander. Divide the slaw between 4 plates and scatter with the peanuts.
